name: Rainbow 5 Trivia Quiz | Rainbow Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: What color is saffron when it is boiled?
What color caps are water polo goaltenders supposed to wear?
What color is the Central Line on maps of the London Underground?
What color are the hottest coals in a barbeque pit?
What is the most prevalent color of cue chalk?
What color tennis balls are used in Wimbledon?
What color was the hull on Dennis Connor's 'Stars and Stripes'?
What sort of evening sky is an omen of good weather tomorrow?
questions.explanation:
Red.

	Red sky at night, sailors delight. Red sky in the morning, sailors take warning.

questions.text: What color is the command knob on Ms Pac Man?
What color are the hairs on a hairy horse crab?
